Class ManageData

java.lang.Object
application.ManageData
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Client, Employee, PopUpBox
public abstract class ManageData extends Object
a class that manages data in database

      public static void removeData(String type, String elementToDelete)
      removes data from database
      Parameters:
      type - data type to remove from database (users, products, etc..)
      elementToDelete - data to remove

    • editData

      public static boolean editData(String type, int option, String select, String content)
      edits data in database
      Parameters:
      type - data type to edit in database (users, products, etc..)
      option - index of data in database
      select - element to edit
      content - new value
      Returns:
      true if edited successfully

    • readAll

      public static ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> readAll(String type)
      reads all data to database
      Parameters:
      type - data type to remove to database (users, products, etc..)
      Returns:
      arrayList of arrayList of strings containing the data read

    • getProfile

      public static ArrayList<String> getProfile(String type, String usrn)
      Parameters:
      type - the profile type to get from database
      usrn - username (key)
      Returns:
      returns an ArrayList of string type that contains the profile gotten from the database

      id - product's ID

      public static boolean isProductInCart(String client, String id)

      Parameters:
      client - client's username
      id - product's ID
      Returns:
      true if the product is in the cart

    • checkQuantity

      public static String checkQuantity(String id, String newQuantity)
      checks if a product is still available
      Parameters:
      id - product's ID
      newQuantity - quantity to check
      Returns:
      "ok" if the product is still available, otherwise it returns the quantity still available

    • removeFromCart

      public static boolean removeFromCart(String client, String id)
      removes a product from cart
      Parameters:
      client - client's username
      id - product's ID
      Returns:
      returns true if the product is successfully removed from the cart

    • removeProductType

      public static void removeProductType(String id)

      id - ID of the product to remove

    • filterList

      public static ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> filterList(int index, String str)

      Returns:
